amendment.description: To reauthorize for 1 year the Secure Rural Schools and Community Self-Determination Act of 2000 and to provide full funding for the Payments in Lieu of Taxes program for 1 year, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 1825 proposed by Senator Baucus.
Amendment SA 1825 under the order of 3/7/2012, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 82 - 16. Record Vote Number: 29.
